# StudyShare

> Free O-Level study materials for Sri Lankan students

**Website:** https://studyshare.space
**Browse Materials:** https://studyshare.space/browse
**FAQ:** https://studyshare.space/faq

StudyShare is a platform where students share and download study materials for the Sri Lankan O-Level curriculum. Materials are available in Sinhala, English, and Tamil.

## What We Offer

- **Past Papers**: Official and model O-Level examination papers - https://studyshare.space/browse?type=paper
- **Short Notes**: Concise study notes created by students and teachers - https://studyshare.space/browse?type=short_note  
- **Textbooks**: Educational books and reference materials - https://studyshare.space/browse?type=book
- **Free Access**: All materials are free to download

## Languages/Mediums

- **Sinhala Medium:** https://studyshare.space/browse?lang=sinhala
- **English Medium:** https://studyshare.space/browse?lang=english
- **Tamil Medium:** https://studyshare.space/browse?lang=tamil

## Subjects

We cover all 52 O-Level subjects including:

### Core Subjects
- Mathematics - https://studyshare.space/browse/mathematics
- Science - https://studyshare.space/browse/science
- English - https://studyshare.space/browse/english
- Sinhala Language & Literature - https://studyshare.space/browse/sinhala-language-literature
- Tamil Language & Literature - https://studyshare.space/browse/tamil-language-literature
- History - https://studyshare.space/browse/history

### Religion
- Buddhism - https://studyshare.space/browse/buddhism
- Christianity - https://studyshare.space/browse/christianity
- Islam - https://studyshare.space/browse/islam
- Catholicism - https://studyshare.space/browse/catholicism
- Hinduism (Saivanery) - https://studyshare.space/browse/saivanery

### Category I (Commerce & Languages)
- Business & Accounting Studies - https://studyshare.space/browse/business-accounting
- Geography - https://studyshare.space/browse/geography
- Civic Education - https://studyshare.space/browse/civic-education
- Entrepreneurship Studies - https://studyshare.space/browse/entrepreneurship
- ICT (Information & Communication Technology) - https://studyshare.space/browse/ict

### Category II (Arts & Technical)
- Art - https://studyshare.space/browse/art-crafts
- Music (Oriental/Western/Carnatic) - https://studyshare.space/browse/music-oriental
- Drama & Theatre - https://studyshare.space/browse/drama-theatre
- Home Economics - https://studyshare.space/browse/home-economics
- Health & Physical Education - https://studyshare.space/browse/health-physical-education

### Category III (Technology & Science)
- Agriculture & Food Technology - https://studyshare.space/browse/agriculture-food-technology
- Design & Construction Technology - https://studyshare.space/browse/design-construction
- Design & Mechanical Technology - https://studyshare.space/browse/design-mechanical
- Design & Electrical/Electronic Technology - https://studyshare.space/browse/design-electrical-electronic

## Target Audience

- Sri Lankan O-Level students (Grade 10-11)
- Teachers preparing study materials
- Parents helping with education
- Anyone preparing for GCE O-Level examinations

## Key Pages

- Homepage: https://studyshare.space
- Browse Materials: https://studyshare.space/browse
- FAQ: https://studyshare.space/faq
